fullDescription.intro: This layer applies multiplicative zero-centered gaussian noise to the layer input. Corresponds to the Keras Gaussian Noise Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.
The standard deviation of the noise distribution.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Gaussian Noise layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Gaussian Noise layer.
